title.rendered: Mandinga gets health relief in the form of Smile on Wheels

content.rendered:
A multi speciality health camp was conducted in Mandiga on the 10th of November 2016. A panel of 4 doctors; a pediatrician, a general physician, 2 dentists and an optometrist provided their services in the camp. A total of 217 patients attended the camp of which 83 were male, 85 female and 49 children. 30 lab tests were done and 22 patients were referred to other hospitals. The Delhi Tuberculosis Association (DTBA) facilitated T.B. Counseling and distributed IEC Materials.

The people were greatly benefitted by the camp and expressed a desire that more such camps be held frequently.
